text: Asɨ 1.24 Lom 16.25, Ef 3.20, Fl 1.10, Kl 1.22, 2 Pi 3.14 agaŋ naludɨ migɨladaci namɨlaŋ naludɨ hɨji vɨdɨvɨdɨŋ agadɨ ma vala mɨgaifɨdɨlaŋ uamalɨ. Nɨbu naludɨ vica coci nudɨ kɨlebɨla ukaci sɨbam hen hɨnibalɨlaŋ uamalɨ. Kɨlebɨla hen namɨlaŋ hugɨ apalɨ hɨnibalɨlaŋ uamalɨ. Hɨnihɨniŋ hɨjɨŋalaŋalaŋ hɨnibalɨlaŋ uamalɨ.
